main event: A civilian reported observing four small round glowing lights crossing the sky while lying in bed in Phoenix, Arizona.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 6 minutes and occurred at 1330 to 1537 on February 9, 1963.,The objects appeared to accelerate rapidly to the southeast.,The lights emitted no sound and left no trails or exhaust.,The observer noted that the speed of the objects was much slower than known aircraft in the area.,This sighting was later linked to a bolide event reported over a wide area.
sighted object: four glowing round lights in the sky
witness description: Civilian, age 39, employed with Del Webb Development Corp.
